item.title: How to Create Custom Card Decks With Tabletop Simulator
item.author: Author
item.description: When Tabletop Simulator released in 2015, the idea of a single application that would allow me to play board games no matter where I found myself was very appealing. However, since it was a sandbox style game, unless you had others who were keen to join in the fun there was little that you could do. About a year after its release, I bought a four pack, shared the extra copies amongst friends and proceeded to play it a grand total of 30 minutes.
